forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms after 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
